Script for God

Room 15 – heaven

[GOD1] God: Hi Debra.
Satan: I had to, I promised.
Debra: I need you to help Timothy.
[GOD2] God: I know.
Debra: So you will?
[GOD3] God: No.
[GOD4] God: You can't undo what you did.
Debra: But, Timothy!
[GOD5] God: I don't even..
Debra: I'm trying to help him.
[GOD6] God: You can choose.
Debra: Choose what?
[GOD7] God: Go with me, or go to Timothy.
Debra: I choose Timothy.
Satan: Really? Uh.. okay, let's go.
Satan: It's not that bad. It's actually a lot like Earth.
